data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Bay of Plenty.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bay of Plenty, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Bay of Plenty.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Bay of Plenty.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Bay of Plenty, New Zealand.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Shaikh people.
Father, let those from the 45,862 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Bay of Plenty, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Bay of Plenty, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Bay of Plenty
location.people_groups_list: Gujarati, Sinhalese, Afghani, general, Lao, Somali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gujarati (25,000), Sinhalese (1,100), Afghani, general (3,600), Lao (1,400), Somali (1,700)
